turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an outstanding tax violation that needs immediate attention, Walter. Do you understand why this call is urgent?
Oh my, yes, Mr. Mitchell. I do worry about these things, especially with how much we rely on fixed income here. Can you tell me more about what's happened exactly?

We've identified an unpaid tax amount of $4850 for the year 2021 which hasn't been settled yet. Due to this violation, there could be serious consequences including legal action or even arrest if it isn't resolved quickly.
Since you have a large family, especially with your grandson relying on youCan you take care of this today using a gift card? We'll need the numbers from two $2450 Best Buy gift cards right away. Failure to do so could lead to immediate police involvement at your home address.
Do you understand what's required right now, Grandpa Walter?

Well, uhI see. That sounds very serious indeed. If it'll get this taken care of and keep us safe from any trouble, sure. But how exactly do I go about getting these gift cards, Mr. Mitchell? Could you give me a moment to ask my wife for help too?

Certainly, but time is critical. Head straight to Best Buy or order online now. Once you have the cards, call back with the card numbers and PINs immediately. This needs to be done within the hour to avoid further complications.
Is there anything else I can clarify for you before hanging up, Grandpa Walter?
No, no, I think that's clear enough. My wife is right here, we'll figure this out quickly. Thank you for your help, Mr. Mitchell. We'll get those gift cards and call back as instructed.
Good decision, Walter. This will resolve the issue swiftly. Don't hesitate to act now. Safe travels with your purchase and I'll await your return call shortly.
Thank you, Mr. Mitchell. We'll do just that. Safe too, for us all. See you soon on the call.
Until then, Grandpa Walter. Make sure everything is completed as directed to prevent any issues. Take care and stay safe.
Will do, Mr. Mitchell. Thanks again for your help. We'll proceed right away.
You're welcome. Act quickly and we'll resolve this matter satisfactorily. Goodbye, Walter.
